attributes.action: Repeal Coronavirus Act and End it
attributes.additional_details:
The vaccine is out, the vaccine is on target. The government said the vaccine was the way out  there is no reason for this Coronavirus Act to carry on. 
As doctors and professions have said we have to deal with it like we do with the flu and other virus. 
Symptoms will never going away not matter how much people try and think they can erase Symptoms,  it will never happen. Life, worklife and education sectors (schools, colleges University) need to be back to normal. No testing
attributes.background: Coronavirus Act needs to be repealed and come to a end. While this act is still in place, schools will never get back to normal, work life  will never get back to normal. It be constant circle causing disruption to life
